property.name: componentTitle
property.label: Component Title
property.description: Title to be displayed for the component

property.name: effectiveAccountId
property.label: Effective Account Id
property.description: The ID of the account under which the user is acting (BETA)

property.name: contentId
property.label: Managed content Id
property.description: The ID of the managed content you wish to display in the help dialog

property.name: contentType
property.label: Managed content type
property.description: The type of managed content being displayed in the help dialog (ex: news)

property.name: emailResults
property.label: Email results checkbox enabled
property.description: When enabled, processing results will be eamiled to the user.

property.name: showEmailResultsCheckbox
property.label: Show email results checkbox
property.description: When enabled, the Email results checkbox will be displayed.
